biography_text: STEWART, Chris, a Representative from Utah; born in Logan, Cache County, Utah, July 15, 1960; graduated from Sky View High School, Smithfield, Utah, 1978; B.S., Utah State University, Logan, Utah, 1984; United States Air Force, 1984-1998; author; business executive; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Thirteenth and to the two succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2013-present).
